briefTitle: E3810-A001-312: Efficacy and Safety of 10 mg Rabeprazole for Treating Heartburn in Frequent Sufferers
officialTitle: E3810-A001-312: Efficacy and Safety of 10 mg Rabeprazole for Treating Heartburn in Frequent Sufferers
summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the safety and efficacy of rabeprazole 10 mg in treating frequent heartburn.

primaryOutcome.measure: Complete Heartburn Relief During the First Full 24-Hour Period in Intent-to-Treat (ITT) Population
